_For questions, please use the [forum](https://discuss.elastic.co/c/elasticsearch-and-hadoop) not the issue tracker_

Make sure to fill the information below before submitting your issue -- thank you! 


### What kind an issue is this?

[ ] Question. This issue tracker is _not_ the place for questions. Please use the [forum](https://discuss.elastic.co/c/elasticsearch-and-hadoop) instead. Thank you!

[ ] Bug report. If you’ve found a bug, please provide a code snippet or test to reproduce it. 
    The easier it is to track down the bug, the faster it is solved. 

[ ] Feature Request. Start by telling us what problem you’re trying to solve. Often a solution
    already exists! Don’t send pull requests to implement new features without first getting our
    support. Sometimes we leave features out on purpose to keep the project small.

